mapper.select: SELECT PERMISSIONID,PID,NAME,ICONCLS,URL,MYID FROM PERMISSION WHERE STATUS = 'A' AND TYPE = #{type} AND ISUSED = 'Y' ORDER BY SORT

SELECT DISTINCT p.PERMISSIONID,p.PID,p.NAME,p.ICONCLS,p.URL,p.MYID FROM ROLEPERMISSION AS rp INNER JOIN ROLE AS r ON rp.ROLEID = r.ROLEID INNER JOIN USERROLE AS ur ON rp.ROLEID = ur.ROLEID INNER JOIN USERS AS u ON u.USERID = ur.USERID INNER JOIN PERMISSION AS p ON rp.PERMISSIONID = p.PERMISSIONID WHERE rp. STATUS = 'A' AND r. STATUS = 'A' AND ur. STATUS = 'A' AND u. STATUS = 'A' AND p. STATUS = 'A' AND p.TYPE = #{1} AND p.ISUSED = 'Y' AND u.USERID = #{0} ORDER BY PERMISSIONID
SELECT PERMISSIONID,CREATED,CREATER,DESCRIPTION,ICONCLS,ISUSED,LASTMOD,MODIFYER,MYID,NAME,PID, PNAME,SORT,STATE,STATUS,TYPE,URL,ISDEFAULT FROM PERMISSION WHERE STATUS='A' AND PID = 0 ORDER BY SORT
SELECT PERMISSIONID FROM PERMISSION WHERE STATUS='A' AND ISDEFAULT='Y'
SELECT * FROM PERMISSION WHERE STATUS='A' AND PID = #{pid} ORDER BY SORT
SELECT * FROM PERMISSION WHERE STATUS='A' AND PERMISSIONID = #{id}
